title: Top Places to visit in South West Khasi Hills, Mawkyrwat, Meghalaya
content:
South West Khasi Hills is an administrative district in the state of Meghalaya in India.
Mawkyrwat is the headquarters of South West Khasi Hills district of Meghalaya state in India. It is situated at a distance of 85 km from the capital city of Shillong.
 
Rich in it
